column3:
Loved the original 5x5 square. This gives you the choice of long or short 
games and it saves your progress. There are adverts but they're a little 
strip at the bottom and aren't annoying.

No instructions when I first started the game but I got the hang of it and 
enjoy it
I love this game. I am addicted to this game I'm trying to be 10 x 10 grid.
Its a good app, you can continue playing it anytime anywhere you want

Good game requiring quick action. 6 different options make us to choose 
suitable one gives flexibility.
I love that there is different sizes
Addictive and hard to put down.
Can only play once per type of grid
Absolutely fantastic, just finished the 10x10 grid. Keep up the good work!
Love the color schemes and that it saves
Addictive but remember the smaller grids are actually harder
I luv it (100x100 DO THAT XD)
Very good way to waist time
Very simple. Very clean. Very addictive. Love this game.
2048 is a great game to play!!!
Really awesome game got a high score of 500 thousand on 5x5
This game is great to pass the time, that's pretty much it.

I love this game!!!! I've been in the same round for about a month!!! My 
score is over 10 million!!! â¤â¤â¤
It's awesome brain teaser loved it ğŸ˜„

Game ran smoothly at first... then after 5 minutes, started lagging a 
bit... I turned off all other apps, but 2048 extreme was still slow. Then 
it started jerking commands that I didn't do... going wrong directions and 
playing multiple turns instantly, so I couldn't go back to where I was. I 
lov...Full ReviewGame ran smoothly at first... then after 5 minutes, started lagging a 
bit... I turned off all other apps, but 2048 extreme was still slow. Then 
it started jerking commands that I didn't do... going wrong directions and 
playing multiple turns instantly, so I couldn't go back to where I was. I 
love the 10x10 concept, it's just a shame that the game won't play properly 
otherwise I wouldn't have deleted it. Ps, using a s5

the game slows down in the new update after playing for like five minutes 
.... and it screwed up my game because at some points it just goes on any 
direction it wantsğŸ˜ğŸ˜

Challenging but not stressful. Can start and stop and restart at anytime. 
Perfect for a quick break game.
Does this game ever end? No strategy just a time waster.
Love this game because it helps your brain
I think I play this game too much!!! Lol, I love it!
Good game, it's fun and not to challenging

I really like this game,is my first time of downloading, but I have managed to get 16384,the 10x10 and still playing ,easy to play, both children and adult can play whenever ,the developers have done a good job .I will tell all my friends to download this game
I'm going to file this under "games made far easier by expanding them". This loses sight of the point of the original game.
Was working great, had 18000 something. Then the game just closed me out, not happy about that.
I guess this is what you do when you get really bored. I'm not trying to win,  with the 10x10 I'm trying to loose
Win on large in about 5 minutes, said click to continue. Clicking did nothing, game locked up at that point, can't progress anywhere.
It's so addicting and I played till I got 16384 my arm actually hurtsğŸ˜
Its fun when you just want to sit and relax. It's realy good
When you need something to distract you completely and Absorb you without it being taxing, this is it. Love it
I like the game but can you add more color to it or make your own one like GREEN THE BEST COLORğŸ˜ğŸ’šğŸ®
A great variation on an old favorite, simple graphics and unobtrusive advertising.
It's good. I like it. The pop up notifications don't have a way to be shut off which isn't cool though.
